name: d3-equidecompose
description: Compute a layout for cutting up polygon and rearranging the pieces to form another polygon of equal area.

scripts.partials: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-polygon:d3_polygon -n partials -o build/partials.js -- partials.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-polygon:d3_polygon -n d3_equidecompose -o build/d3-equidecompose.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-equidecompose.js -c -m -o build/d3-equidecompose.min.js
